data.event: Acting U.S. Attorney Michelle Jacobs announced the indictment Tuesday charging 35-year-old Angela Martin-Mulu and 39-year-old Edward Bosire with mail fraud.
The two Kenyan citizens arrived in the U.S. in 1999 and received political asylum in 2007.
The two Kenyan citizens arrived in the U.S. in 1999 and received political asylum in 2007.

event.title: visited the Pewaukee monastery in December 2004

data.event: An FBI affidavit has said the married couple first visited the Pewaukee monastery in December 2004 and told the nuns they were brother and sister, homeless and would be killed if they were deported to Kenya.
